lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau Anyk rogI Awvq hYN bYd igRih; jYso jYso rog qYso AauKDu KuvwveI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as several patients come to the house of a medical practitioner, and he administers medicine to each one of them according to their ailment.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ ik Anykwˆ rogI vYd dy Gr Awauˆdy hn qwˆ vYd rogwˆ dI pCwx kr ky ijs ijs qrHwˆ dw iksy dw rog huMdw hY; aus aus qrHwˆ dI dvweI rogI nUM KuAwauˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy rwj dÍwr log Awvq syvw nimq; joeI jwhIN jog qYsI tihl bqwveI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as myriad people come to the door of the king to serve him, and each one is told to prefer service that he is capable and fit to do;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ rwj duAwry syvw nOkrI vwsqy Anykwˆ lok Awauˆdy hn; ijhVw ijs syvw dy Xog huMdw hY; vYsI aus nUM syvw d`sI jwˆdI hY Bwv aus nOkrI qy lw ilAw jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy dwqw pws jn ArQI Anyk AwvYN; joeI joeI jwcY dy dy duKn imtwveI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as many needy persons come to a kind-hearted donor and he gives them whatever each one asks, thus allaying distress of each one of them.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ dwqy pws Anykwˆ lok Awauˆdy hn; ijhVw ijs syvw dy Xog huMdw hY; vYsI aus nUM syvw d`sI jwˆdI hY Bwv aus nOkrI qy lw ilAw jwˆdw hY

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur srn Awvq hYN Anyk isK; jYso jYso Bwau qYsI kwmnw pujwveI [674[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly many Sikhs come into the refuge of the True Guru, and whatever devotion and love one has in the mind the , True Guru fulfils it accordingly.  (674)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ gurU jI dI Srn Anykwˆ isK Awauˆdy hn; pr jYsI jYsI aunHwˆ dI BwauxI huMdI hY vYsIAwˆ aunHwˆ dIAwˆ kwmnwˆ gurU jI pUrn kr dyˆdy hn]674]
